articles.title: HSBC to save $1.8 billion over two years under new CEO - CNN
articles.description: HSBC HSBA.L posted annual profit on Wednesday that beat estimates, helped by increased revenue in wealth and markets businesses, and set stiff cost-cut targets as its new CEO implements a revamp of the Asia-focused bank to boost returns.
